apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Microsoft Project Oxford Face API key.

faceAttributes.label: Face Attributes
faceAttributes.help: (Optional) Analyze and return the one or more specified face attributes in the comma-separated string like 'age, gender'. Supported face attributes include age, facialHair, gender, headPose, and smile. Note that each face attribute analysis has additional computational and time cost. Default: age, gender

includeFaceId.label: Include Face ID
includeFaceId.help: (Optional) Get Face IDs of the detected faces or not. The default value is true.

includeFaceLandmarks.label: Include Face Landmarks
includeFaceLandmarks.help: (Optional) Get Face Landmarks of the detected faces or not. The default value is false.
